ingredients.item: 4 turnips, peeled and cut into chunks

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a saucepan over a high heat. Once hot, add the turnips and fry for about 5 minutes until starting to colour.
Turn the heat down, then add the shallots, garlic and ginger and fry for another 5 minutes until softened. Tip in the spice mix then cook for a further 2 minutes.
Add the chard and chickpeas, along with their water, then season and simmer for 15 minutes. Warm the flatbreads and serve alongside.
